name: mysql-workbench
description: [MySQL Workbench]({{ project_url }}) is a unified visual tool for database architects, developers, and DBAs. MySQL Workbench provides data modeling, SQL development, and comprehensive administration tools for server configuration, user administration, backup, and much more.

env.description: Specify a timezone to use EG Europe/London.

volumes.description: Users home directory in the container, stores program settings.

readme-vars.project_blurb: [MySQL Workbench]({{ project_url }}) is a unified visual tool for database architects, developers, and DBAs. MySQL Workbench provides data modeling, SQL development, and comprehensive administration tools for server configuration, user administration, backup, and much more.

param_env_vars.desc: Specify a timezone to use EG Europe/London.

param_volumes.desc: Users home directory in the container, stores program settings.

readme-vars.app_setup_block:
The application can be accessed at:

* http://yourhost:3000/

By default the user/pass is abc/abc, if you change your password or want to login manually to the GUI session for any reason use the following link:

* http://yourhost:3000/?login=true
